issue.title: operator>>(basic_istream&&, T&&) returns basic_istream&, but should probably return basic_istream&&

blockquote.pre: auto& is = make_istream() >> x; // oops, istream object is already gone

discussion.p: With a basic_istream&& return type, the above would be ill-formed, and generally we'd preserve the value category properly.

JW: think this needs proper consideration, it would make stream() >> x >> y >> z go from 3 operator>> calls to 6 operator>> calls, and wouldn't prevent dangling references (change the example to auto&&)
